description: This file defines an interface class 'IOmiProxy' within the 'omi' namespace for interacting with an omi_dbus_api. It declares virtual methods for mounting and unmounting encrypted bundles, and for registering and unregistering error listeners, along with associated types and enums.

classes.name: omi::IOmiProxy
classes.description: Interface class providing methods to manage encrypted bundles and error listeners in the omi system.

methods.name: mountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Mounts a crypted bundle given its ID and file paths; outputs the decrypted bundle path.

methods.name: umountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Unmounts a crypted bundle identified by its ID.

methods.name: registerListener
methods.description: Registers an error listener callback and returns a listener ID.

methods.name: unregisterListener
methods.description: Unregisters an error listener given its ID.

calls: virtual bool mountCryptedBundle(const std::string&, const std::string&, const std::string&, std::string&)
virtual long unsigned registerListener(const OmiErrorListener&, const void*)

ctags.name: OmiErrorListener
ctags.pattern: /^    typedef std::function<void(const std::string&, ErrorType, const void*)> OmiErrorListener;$/
